{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2505.00328v1", "title": "The spectral characteristics of the Sturm Hamiltonian with eventually
  periodic type", "summary": "In this paper we consider the spectral characteristics of the Sturm
Hamiltonian with eventually periodic type frequencies under large coupling and
establish strict inequalities between the optimal H\"older exponent of the
density of states measure, the dimension of the density of states measure, the
dimension of the spectrum, and the transport exponent by analyzing the
thermodynamic pressure function. Also, we provide the large coupling asymptotic
properties of the four spectral characteristics.", "main_category": "math.DS", "categories": "math.DS", "published": "2025-05-01T05:58:07Z"}
